name: RETROSPELSFLOPPYVALEN
description:
This game was (mostly) made during the glorious event RETROSPELSFESTIVALEN in Malmö 2016.

PLOT TWIST:
The game is about a whale that propels itself by shooting 3,5 floppys and lives in an infinite but confined space. (A BIT LIKE EARTH)

HOW TO SCORE:
The more disks = The More score!

HAVE FUN!
